_description: A song urging penance — three quatrains (abab) plus Latin refrain (c), ‘Miserere mei deus’ plus burden (cc): ‘A blyssyd ffull songe þis is to vs / Miserere mei deus’

OxfLinLat141.First Lines:
Thow þat know þi selfe gyltyA ȝens þi god
                    þu hast done wrong…
OxfLinLat141.Last Lines:
…And syng þis song with myld modMiserere mei
                    deus
OxfLinLat141.Editions:
Palti,  Kathleen. 
             “An Unpublished Fifteenth-Century Carol Collection: Oxford, Lincoln
                College MS Lat. 141.” 
             Medium Aevum.
         77 (2008): 260-78: 267.
